languages.text: "Я оперировал машиной, сотворенной слугами Архиврага, и тем самым привлек внимание повелителя культа. Я должен благодарить Трон, что это было лишь мимолетное прикосновение, ибо иначе ... иначе мы бы не говорили здесь с тобой".

"I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."
languages.original_text: "Я оперировал машиной, сотворенной слугами Архиврага, и тем самым привлек внимание повелителя культа. Я должен благодарить Трон, что это было лишь мимолетное прикосновение, ибо иначе ... иначе мы бы не говорили здесь с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the Cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."

"I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the Cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."

"I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the Cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."

"I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the Cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."

languages.text: “我当时操作着那台由混沌大敌的仆人们创造的机器。而当我操作机器的时候，我引起了那位邪教主宰的注意。感谢黄金王座，那仅仅是一瞬间的接触。如果接触得再久一些……恐怕我们此刻就没办法像这样谈话了。”
languages.original_text: "I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."

traits.locale_text: “我当时操作着那台由混沌大敌的仆人们创造的机器。而当我操作机器的时候，我引起了那位邪教主宰的注意。感谢黄金王座，那仅仅是一瞬间的接触。如果接触得再久一些……恐怕我们此刻就没办法像这样谈话了。”

languages.original_text: "I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the Cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."

languages.text: «Estaba operando la máquina de los sirvientes del Archienemigo, y, al hacerlo, llamé la atención del amo del Culto. Gracias al Trono, solo fue un toque leve. De haber sido algo más... no estaríamos aquí, hablando».
languages.original_text: "I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."

traits.locale_text: «Estaba operando la máquina de los sirvientes del Archienemigo, y, al hacerlo, llamé la atención del amo del Culto. Gracias al Trono, solo fue un toque leve. De haber sido algo más... no estaríamos aquí, hablando».

languages.text: 「私は渾沌の勢力のしもべが作った機械を操作していたのだが、その際に教団の主の注意を引いてしまったのだ。それが一瞥に過ぎなかったことを王座に感謝せねばならない…もしそうでなかったら、今日ここで話すことはなかっただろう」
languages.original_text: "I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."

traits.locale_text: 「私は渾沌の勢力のしもべが作った機械を操作していたのだが、その際に教団の主の注意を引いてしまったのだ。それが一瞥に過ぎなかったことを王座に感謝せねばならない…もしそうでなかったら、今日ここで話すことはなかっただろう」

languages.text: "Ich habe die Maschine bedient, die von den Dienern des Erzfeinds erschaffen wurde. Dadurch habe ich die Aufmerksamkeit des Drahtziehers des Kults geweckt. Dem Thron sei Dank, dass es nur eine kurze Berührung war, ansonsten ... würden wir uns heute nicht unterhalten."
languages.original_text: "I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die Maschine bedient, die von den Dienern des Erzfeinds erschaffen wurde. Dadurch habe ich die Aufmerksamkeit des Drahtziehers des Kults geweckt. Dem Thron sei Dank, dass es nur eine kurze Berührung war, ansonsten ... würden wir uns heute nicht unterhalten."

languages.text: « Pendant que je manipulais la machine créée par les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi, j'ai attiré l'attention de leur maître. Par chance, le contact n'a été que très bref. Dans le cas contraire... nous ne serions pas en train d'en discuter aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."

traits.locale_text: « Pendant que je manipulais la machine créée par les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi, j'ai attiré l'attention de leur maître. Par chance, le contact n'a été que très bref. Dans le cas contraire... nous ne serions pas en train d'en discuter aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: "Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârlarınca yapılmış makineyi kullandım. Bu da tarikatın efendisinin dikkatini çekti. Taht'a şükürler olsun ki şöyle bir bakıp geçti. Geçmeseydi... Şu anda konuşuyor olamazdık."
languages.original_text: "I was operating the machine created by the servants of the Archenemy, and in doing so, I attracted the attention of the cult's master. Thank the Throne that it was only a glancing touch — if it hadn't been... we would not be speaking here today."

traits.locale_text: "Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârlarınca yapılmış makineyi kullandım. Bu da tarikatın efendisinin dikkatini çekti. Taht'a şükürler olsun ki şöyle bir bakıp geçti. Geçmeseydi... Şu anda konuşuyor olamazdık."
